import React from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Pager from '../Components/pager'; import jobService from '../API/jobs'; class jobList extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = {show : false,page : 1,data: []}; this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); this.handleClose = this.handleClose.bind(this); } handleClick() { this.setState({show: true}); } handleClose() { this.setState({show: false}); } loadPageData = async val => { var accessToken = localStorage.getItem('loggedUserToken'); await jobService.get( '/recruiters/jobs?page=' + this.state.page, { headers: { 'Authorization': accessToken } } ).then((response) => { if(response.data.success){ this.setState({data:response.data.data}); } }) .catch((err)=>{ }); } componentDidMount() { this.loadPageData(); } render(){ var renderList = ''; if(this.state.data.length > 0){ var renderList = this.state.data.map((val)=>{ return(

{val.title}

{val.description}

{val.location}

); }); } return(
{renderList}
Applicants for this Job

) } } export default jobList;
